refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The job element describes a job, contract, or other employment engagement.

refsect2.title: Parents
refsect2.para: job may be contained in these elements:

listitem.para: A string used to uniquely identify a job. The job may then be referred to by this identifier.

informalexample.programlisting: <job> <jobtitle>Sr. VP of Soap Suds Engineering</jobtitle> <employer>Proctor and Gamble</employer> <period> <from><date> <month>May</month> <year>1982</year> </date></from> <to><date> <month>June</month> <year>1988</year> </date></to> </period> </job>
